name: mern-template
description: A minimal MERN stack template with authentication

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm run start & cd ../frontend && npm run start
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy-local: npm run build && npm run cache-bust-local
scripts.deploy-hostinger: npm run build-frontend && echo 'Frontend built - Upload build folder to Hostinger'
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build-frontend && npm run cache-bust-render && echo 'Ready for Hostinger upload'
